articles.title: Australia battles spread of Japanese encephalitis - Medical Xpress
articles.description: Australia said Friday it is buying extra vaccines to fight the potentially deadly, mosquito-borne Japanese encephalitis virus, which has spread down the flood-hit east coast for the first time.
